text: The alveolar ejective fricative is a type of consonantal sound, used in some spoken languages. The symbol in the International Phonetic Alphabet that represents this sound is . ==Features== Features of the alveolar ejective fricative: ==Occurrence== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="2"|Language !! Word !! IPA!! Meaning !!
